cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.LO, cs.IT. 

This paper deals with the representation of unary finite automata as arithmetic progressions, which is a topic related to formal languages (cs.FL) and computational complexity (cs.CC). The correction proposed in the paper involves a careful analysis of the size of the arithmetic progressions, which requires techniques from discrete mathematics (cs.DS) and combinatorics (cs.LO). Finally, the paper mentions the space complexity of the algorithm, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT).
